sqlList: create table AnObject (id bigint generated by default as identity, basicTest bigint, subTest bigint, myInt integer, myString varchar(20), myLong bigint, myDate date, myBoolean boolean, myFloat float, myDouble double, primary key (id))
create table SubTest (id bigint generated by default as identity, subTest bigint, name varchar(80), myString varchar(20), primary key (id))
create table Email (id bigint generated by default as identity, email varchar(80))
alter table AnObject add constraint bt_bt foreign key (basicTest) references AnObject
alter table AnObject add constraint bt_st foreign key (subTest) references SubTest
alter table SubTest add constraint st_st foreign key (subTest) references SubTest
